Package com.group10b.blueka.Operation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DisconnectOperation  
    DiscoverOperation
    An operation for the scanner to discover the service provided by the server.
    GattCloseOperation
    An operation to close the gatt profile by either scanner or advertiser.
    Operation
    The superclass of all operations.
    OperationManager
    This is the Manager of all operations, this will be used by the advertiser and scanner for to operated their operations sequentially.
    WriteCharacteristicOperation
    Operation for the server to write its local characteristic.
    WriteRequestOperation
    An operation by the scanner to request a write to the characteristic of the server.
